headline: Dealmakers Hit $1.8 Trillion as They Get Used to Trade Chaos
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Big money takeovers of private companies helped drive mergers and acquisitions in the first half, as dealmakers got comfortable writing sizable checks in topsy-turvy markets.
